author: ebrondol
body:
This PR contains two main parts:
- the tilted DetId scheme and navigation has been modified in order to reconstruct tracks also in the tilted geometry (tested with OLD clusters).
- the DPG tool regarding Occupancy/Multiplicity map has been updated in order to take into account also the possibility to have phase2Clusters and for both tilted and flat geometry. Here how to run it for the new clusters produced by the tilted WF [1] and for the old ones produced by the flat [2].

Still missing:
- using new clusters in tracking
- adapting DPG tool for the phase2clusters on track

@boudoul @delaere @venturia

title: Fixing tracking in tilted and adapting Occupancy Map tool
